channel.title: On running all sources i get :
channel.description:
on running all sources i get this error [code] [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106 ) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(PipeImpl.java:122) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv iderImpl.java:27) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:133) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(WindowsSelector Impl.java:104) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo wsSelectorProvider.java:26) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:209) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:127) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co nnect [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Native Method) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp l.java:500) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja va:146) [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:78)
[10/19/11 8:50 PM]: ... 10 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Its mainly on [code] java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection[/code]
and I think i mustm ake an expection for java/port forward on my firewall but idk how to do it/what ports so can someone that knows in it helps me? thanks.

item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

on running all sources i get this error

[code]
[10/19/11 8:50 PM]: Exception in thread “main” [10/19/11 8:50 PM]: java.io.IOExc
eption: Unable to establish loopback connection
[10/19/11 8:50 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106
)

iderImpl.java:27)

Impl.java:104)

wsSelectorProvider.java:26)

tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162)

ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141)

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Its mainly on

and I think i mustm ake an expection for java/port forward on my firewall but idk how to do it/what ports so can someone that knows in it helps me? thanks.
